subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Souchak, a leading pro golfer of the 1950s and early 60s who set a PGA Tour record for lowest 72-hole score that stood for 46 years, died Thursday.
snippet: Mr. Souchak, a leading pro golfer of the 1950s and early 60s who set a PGA Tour record for lowest 72-hole score that stood for 46 years, died Thursday.
